Class Functions

java.lang.Object
main.code.Functions
public class Functions extends Object
A class containing functions needed to run the Continuous Integration Server

    • sendFromServer

      public static boolean sendFromServer(String recipient, String subject, String text)
      Sends an email with a given text String as a message and a given String as subject from the server to the given email address of the recipent
      Parameters:
      recipient - The recipents email address
      subject - The text to be inserted in the subject field of the email
      text - The text to send in an email
      Returns:
      true or false Returns false if the recipients email address is faulty otherwise true

    • printFileToPage

      public static void printFileToPage(String fileName, String title, PrintWriter pw, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Prints the contents of a file to the web page that the printwriter object is writing to, in HTML format.
      Parameters:
      fileName - file to print
      title - the title the web tab should have
      pw - the PrintWriter object that is printing to the web page
      response - the HttpServletResponse object which is printing to the webpage (used to clear the page).

    • processURLrequest

      public static void processURLrequest(String requestedURL, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws IOException
      Processes the requested URL to a specific build. Prints a web page in HTML format, with tests result for that specific build.
      Parameters:
      requestedURL - the request URL
      response - the HttpServletResponse which can write to the page
      Throws:
      IOException - if an exception is thrown when trying to write to the page
